dcterms:description: A dataset for studying image understanding, object recognition, image captioning, and visual question-answering tasks, containing images and textual annotations.
dcterms:title: MS COCO

dcterms:creator: Bryan A Plummer
Liwei Wang
Chris M Cervantes
Juan C Caicedo
Julia Hockenmaier
Svetlana Lazebnik
dcterms:description: A dataset that collects region-to-phrase correspondences for richer image-to-sentence models, providing a resource for various vision and language tasks.
dcterms:title: Flickr30k

dcterms:creator: Letitia Parcalabescu
Michele Cafagna
Lilitta Muradjan
Anette Frank
Iacer Calixto
Albert Gatt
dcterms:description: A task-independent benchmark for vision and language models centered on linguistic phenomena, designed to evaluate the capabilities of V&L models.
dcterms:title: VALSE

dcterms:creator: Ravi Shekhar
Sandro Pezzelle
Yauhen Klimovich
Aurélie Herbelot
Moin Nabi
Enver Sangineto
Raffaella Bernardi
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to find mismatches between images and their language captions, used to evaluate the robustness of V&L models.
dcterms:title: FOIL-COCO
